description.en: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.ar: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.br: Adiciona uma quantidade de vida aleatória (1-5) ao seu Pet. Não ressuscita Pets.
description.cns: 为你的宠物增加一个随机召唤兽生命值(1-5)。无法复活宠物。
description.de: Dieses Item gibt deinem Pet per Zufall zwischen 1 und 5 Leben dazu, wenn es noch am Leben ist.
description.fi: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.fil: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.fr: élixir redonnant au moins 1 vie à votre familier invoqué, et jusqu'à 5 si vous avez de la chance (attention : le familier doit être vivant)
description.id: Menambahkan jumlah kehidupan secara acak (1-5) ke pet Anda. Tidak menghidupkan kembali pet.
description.it: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.jp: ペットの生命がランダムで1～5増加します。生命が99のときは使用できません。
description.kr: 랜덤 확률로 리어펫의 생명을 1 ~ 5 올려 줍니다.
description.nl: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.pl: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.ru: Добавляет питомцу от 1 до 5 жизней. Не действует на мертвых питомцев.
description.sp: Añade una cantidad aleatoria de vidas (1-5) a tu mascota. No sirve para revivir mascotas.
description.sw: Add a random life amount (1-5) to your Pet. Does not revive pets.
description.th: เพิ่มจำนวนชีวิตแบบสุ่ม (1-5) ให้กับสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณ ไม่ชุบชีวิตสัตว์เลี้ยง
description.tw: 以隨機機率提升召喚獸生命 1 ~ 5，無法復活召喚獸。
description.vi: Thêm số lượng cuộc sống ngẫu nhiên (1-5) cho Thú cưng của bạn. Không hồi sinh vật nuôi.
